text: Sergei Aleksandrovich Filippenkov (; 2 August 1971 – 15 October 2015) was a Russian football manager and player. Filippenkov died of a heart attack during a friendly match between former players on 15 October 2015.Бывший футболист ЦСКА Филиппенков скончался во время товарищеского матча ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian football managers
title: Sergei Filippenkov
